mapper.insert: INSERT INTO xmr_wallet_incoming (user_id, subaddress, tx_hash, amount_xmr, block_height, ts, settled, settled_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{subaddress}, #{txHash}, #{amountXmr}, #{blockHeight}, #{ts}, #{settled}, #{settledTime})

INSERT IGNORE INTO xmr_wallet_incoming (user_id, subaddress, tx_hash, amount_xmr, block_height, ts, settled, settled_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{subaddress}, #{txHash}, #{amountXmr}, #{blockHeight}, #{ts}, #{settled}, #{settledTime})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM xmr_wallet_incoming WHERE settled = 0 ORDER BY ts ASC LIMIT #{limit}
SELECT * FROM xmr_wallet_incoming WHERE settled = 0 AND ts IS NOT NULL ORDER BY ts ASC LIMIT #{limit}
mapper.update: UPDATE xmr_wallet_incoming SET settled = 1, settled_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE xmr_wallet_incoming SET settled = 1, settled_time = NOW() WHERE tx_hash = #{txHash}
mapper.select: SELECT MAX(block_height) FROM xmr_wallet_incoming WHERE block_height IS NOT NULL
